General.Name: Regional S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Regional S.A.B. de C.V. provides various banking products and services. It offers financial services and products, such as loans, point-of-sale terminals, insurance products, and other products for small business and entrepreneurs; loans for working capital or investment projects for medium-sized businesses; credit cards, personal loans, automobile finance, and mortgages; savings and investment products; and financial leasing services. The company also provides factoring, and online and mobile banking services. It operates branches, ATMs, and POS terminals in Mexico. Regional S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1994 and is based in San Pedro Garza García, Mexico.
General.Address: Avenue Pedro Ramirez Vazquez #200-12, San Pedro Garza Garcia, NL, Mexico, 66278
